description: The hyperactive ninja with dreams of becoming Hokage. Known for his Nine-Tails chakra and never-give-up attitude, Naruto fights to protect his village and friends.
A high school student who becomes the vessel for the powerful curse Sukuna. Despite harboring evil within, Yuji maintains his compassionate nature and fights to save others.
The rubber-powered captain of the Straw Hat Pirates with dreams of finding the One Piece treasure. His infectious optimism and determination inspire his crew on their grand adventure.
A kind-hearted demon slayer seeking to cure his sister Nezuko and avenge his family. Master of Water Breathing technique with an exceptional sense of smell.
A young soldier driven by revenge against the Titans who destroyed his hometown. Possesses the power of the Attack Titan and harbors dark secrets about the world.
A quirkless boy who inherits the powerful One For All quirk from his idol All Might. Despite being born powerless, his heroic spirit drives him to become the greatest hero.
The legendary Saiyan warrior who protects Earth from powerful threats. Known for his incredible fighting abilities and pure-hearted nature that turns enemies into allies.
A brilliant high school student who discovers a supernatural notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it. His quest for justice leads him down a dark path of moral corruption.
A superhero who can defeat any enemy with a single punch, leading to existential boredom. Despite his overwhelming power, he struggles with mundane problems and lack of recognition.
A young boy searching for his father who left him to become a Hunter. Possesses incredible potential and an unwavering determination to achieve his goals.
A young alchemist searching for the Philosopher's Stone to restore his and his brother's bodies after a failed alchemical experiment. Known as the Fullmetal Alchemist.
A college student who becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter. Struggles to maintain his humanity while adapting to his new ghoul nature and the dark world he's entered.
A high school student who gains Soul Reaper powers and protects the living world from evil spirits called Hollows. Wields the powerful Zangetsu sword.
A middle school boy with powerful psychic abilities who tries to live a normal life. Known as 'Mob,' he struggles to control his emotions and overwhelming psychic powers.
A young girl trapped in a magical spirit world who must work at a bathhouse to save her parents. Shows incredible courage and growth throughout her supernatural adventure.
A young man who merges with his pet devil Pochita to become Chainsaw Man. Fights devils while dealing with poverty, simple desires, and complex relationships.
A master spy who creates a fake family for his mission, unaware that his wife is an assassin and his daughter is a telepath. Code name: Twilight.
A high school boy in Tokyo who mysteriously begins swapping bodies with a rural girl named Mitsuha. Their connection transcends time and space in this romantic tale.
A stoic high school student with the powerful Stand 'Star Platinum.' Known for his iconic catchphrase 'Yare yare daze' and his quest to save his mother from a curse.
A fierce warrior raised by wolves who fights to protect the forest from human destruction. Known as Princess Mononoke, she embodies the spirit of nature's resistance.
A laid-back bounty hunter aboard the spaceship Bebop with a mysterious past involving the Red Dragon Crime Syndicate. Master of Jeet Kune Do martial arts.
A former child soldier learning to understand emotions and human connection through her work as an Auto Memory Doll, writing letters for others.
An exiled prince who gains the power of Geass and leads a rebellion against the Holy Britannian Empire. A brilliant strategist with a complex moral compass.
The leader of a biker gang in Neo-Tokyo who becomes involved in a government conspiracy involving psychic powers. A loyal friend fighting to save his childhood companion Tetsuo.
